testsuite.name: tests.job.JenkinsfileTestSpec

testcase.name: Jenkinsfile should run gradle tests with expected command line validate:null gradle: null
Jenkinsfile should run gradle tests with expected command line validate:true gradle: test
Jenkinsfile should run gradle tests with expected command line validate:false gradle: build test
Jenkinsfile gradle failure should fail job
Jenkinsfile cover all build results for post sections - SUCCESS
Jenkinsfile cover all build results for post sections - FAILURE
Jenkinsfile cover all build results for post sections - ABORTED
Jenkinsfile cover all build results for post sections - UNSTABLE
